sheet.text: And check out where we landed.
It looks like I'm back at Suzuran Junior High...!
Well, looks like I made it back home.
This could be bad. Arle, we need to find them.
Well, I guess I'll go search by myself.
No biggie, just a little trip aboard a starship!
I'm jealous! ★ Sounds like a cool adventure! ★
Well, this huge object just landed on top of the school roof. ★
And there's a boy up there, too... with super-tight clothes! ★
I had a feeling if ANYONE knew something, it'd be you! ★
The Starship Tetra has landed on an unidentified world.
Ship status: Very broken. Crew status: Very missing.
It's... well, it's... It's pretty beat up...
Plus, my crew appears to be missing.
Ringo, I think there's only one logical course.
Do you think you can help me with something? Something very important...
I need to blow off steam. You still want to learn to clear Tetriminos?
It's easy. Just make a solid line, and they'll clear!
There's some other stuff, like Tetris Line Clears and Back-to-Backs and T-Spins...
But I'm sure you'll figure it all out, EASY-PEASY!
I don't know what "recon" is, but I'll tag along... We should look for your crew!
You sure? You don't have anything else to take care of?
Out of all the planets... What are the odds!?
And as a resident, it's my job to show you around!
Plus, I owe you, since you were a gentleman and brought me home!
So let's go find your crew!
For a moment there, I was convinced you were...
No wait, hold on... What ARE you...?
He's in the Physics Club with me. He's a pro at popping Puyos!
Are there... many like him on this planet?
Nope! He's one of a kind! Special edition! Limited run!
Well, I saw something most unconventional over there.
I'm led to believe... a trembling chihuahua? Walking upright?
...And the most exceedingly out-of-shape robot ever.
Am I thinking what you're thinking...?
That has to be Ai and Zed! We know those two!
W-Wait a moment. Just a sec... I'd like to join.
I'd like to observe how this all plays out just a bit more closely.
Who is a good doggy? That is correct... nothing to fear...
Tee should arrive soon to help us. Just remember, who is a good doggy?
It's not every day you see a chihuahua sitting in a robot's lap.
Can I take a picture with you?
Ringo, this is hardly the occasion for that. We don't know if he's had his shots.
Ai! Zed! You're all in one piece!
Ah, Captain, I am pleased to see you are in only one piece, yourself.
As you can see, Ai is afraid of this alien world.
Aw, looks like he needs a belly rub! ★
Captain, I have not been successful at calming him down.
Say, Ringo, maybe you could give it a try?
Let me show you that my hometown really is a safe place!
There's only one way to calm you down...
Young lady, I am in your debt.
You stopped this from being one of those... dog day afternoons.
This chihuahua doesn't make sense, does he?
Tee, does your whole crew look like him?
No, he's... one of a kind! Special edition! Limited run!
Ai! Zed! The SS Tetra is damaged.
And the rest of the crew is unaccounted for.
I saw Jay and Elle earlier.
THEY WERE TRYING TO SEE HOW MUCH MISCHIEF THEY COULD GET INTO!
AND THEN THEY SKIPPED OFF, HAND-IN-HAND!
We need to find them before they cause any trouble.
Zed and I will take a look at the Tetra.
Sounds like a proper task for an engineer, after all...
...let's see which of us can cause more trouble!
I think they're talking about us!
You two ran off just to go play pranks...?
Yep! They said they wanted to cause mayhem!
A girl with curly-curly, pink hair~!
A lady with wavy-wavy, blue hair~!
Hey, shouldn't you be looking for Ess?
Where is she? Have you seen her!?
Okay, we need to find her.
Aaaanyhow, maybe I should head back.
I'll go with you and keep you safe!
That sounds like a bad idea.
I'll make sure these two get back to the starship with zero-to-minimal detours. ★
Yeah, we didn't agree to that!
Ya want something to complain about, eh? Didn't think so! Now vamoose!
Tee is supposed to be the Captain.
How could he let a cute girl like me get into this situation?
I'm lost and alone in a scary world...
Th-That's the same little girl, right?
I-I didn't know she had a softer side to her.
Let's try not to stare... Don't make direct eye contact.
Wh-Why don't... you handle this one, Tee?
Hey, Ess! Captain's here to rescue you!
Well, you're late! Where the heck WERE you!?
Want to play with some squishy Puyos? It might calm you down...
YOU'RE THE WORST CAPTAIN IN THE UNIVERSE!
Well, that looks like it helped.
It didn't help the fact you're a useless captain, did it?
It didn't UN-crash the Tetra or UN-strand me on an alien homeworld, did it?
You should be glad I'm even speaking to you!
Excellent, she's back to her old self again. Mission accomplished.
So, Ess, how'd you end up here?
There was this girl with a crooked stick in each hand...
I kind of followed her... She was just shouting "Hyahhh!"
And when we got here, she was gone!
All these descriptions keep sounding vaguely familiar...
Who cares! My turn to ask questions!
Is Papa safe...? Is he? Please, tell me Papa's safe!
We didn't meet Ess's dad, did we?
He has a big, round body and an even bigger heart!
Y-You know he's a robot, right!?
...Of course she knows he's a robot.
Do you have a problem with Papa?
N-No, it sounds completely, biologically routine!
Hey, let's all head back now! Your Papa's waiting, Ess.
Tee, you're going to go along with this narrative!?
...Not that there's anything wrong with it, of course.
We decided to come back and wait for you guys!
There were introductions earlier. It was all very cordial, I assure you.
And the Tetra looks like it's in much better shape.
Ai, how is she? All fixed up?
Certainly. This Risukuma fellow has proven quite helpful, actually.
We combined our shared know-how while you were gone.
And I think you'll find much of the Tetra's functionality has been restored.
Ah, don't worry, he's just excited. ★
He gets this way when he's doing science... ★
Oh... okay... well, that all seems perfectly normal.
More importantly, are we ready to depart, Ai?
Not quite, Captain. There's a few complications...
In particular, we won't be able to travel any great distance.
We need some special parts to properly fix the Tetra.
Do you know who that is?
There's no way I'd mistake that voice!
The boundary shall fall. The two worlds WILL merge.
And if you stand in my way, I shall kick you. Really, super hard.
I hate arrogant, spoiled, stuck-up, self-entitled girls! BLEH!
Do you see what WE have to deal with now, Ess?
No, no, no! Guys, this is Raffina! She's my friend!
HEY! That's the sleazebin who tricked us!
She's not just a bin, she's a sleazewagon!
Wh-What are you two talking about...?
Wait, Raffina, why're your eyes so scary?
And... "merging two worlds"? That's not how you USUALLY talk.
I shall have to demonstrate then.
Let us battle... Puyo Puyo AND Tetris! TOGETHER!
That battle was craaazy. Raffina was craaazy!
We should get out of here.
We need to figure out what's happening.
The super-duper, hairy-scary, evil-weevil, weirdy-wacky, gothy-girl!
Hey, she's the one that made ME get lost.
The girl with the crooked sticks!
Eh? Crooked what-now...? You gotta workshop those adjectives, hun.
The two worlds shall become one.
Ringo, is this how she normally is?
I mean, it's not TOO far off!
She's usually rather dark, but not quite so... aggressive.
She is weird, though. That part's definitely normal.
Not cool! No attacking during a side-conversation!
Carby, this whole situation is getting outta hand!
Something weird's gotten into Feli and Raffina.
Plus, there's those Tetriminos raining down.
And we got simultaneous Puyo Puyo AND Tetris battles.
We're cursed. Everywhere we go, weird stuff happens!
I have a really bad feeling... We need to stop them, whatever they're up to.
Do NOT try and stop me.
We will battle with Tetriminos. We will battle with Puyos.
Wait, but why? You normally just like Puyos...!
Were those the people who tricked you?
My sensors believe they are telling the truth.
I'm positive too. That was the girl with the sticks.
N-No, there's no way that's true.
...I mean, unless there was some shiny jewelry at stake or something!
Y-Yeah, that's not really helping your case, Amitie.
Five minutes with Rulue, and she didn't mention the Dark Prince ONCE.
THAT'S your method of gauging crazy?
I apologize for butting in like this...
But perhaps this isn't a problem we can solve right now.
Why not address the solvable problems first?
Thanks, Ai. You have a point.
You were saying that there's a way to repair the Tetra?
U-Use your words, Ris. Use your words.
Ah, yes, that's much better. Pardon me. *throat clear*
Your starship's flight capabilities are severely limited.
But we can rebuild her. We have the technology. ...It's around here somewhere.
We just need special parts from up in the sky.
So we just get the right parts, and the Tetra's all good?
I've written down the details. Please disregard the doodle.
One more thing: We can't hold much fuel or water.
I propose we don't all attempt to board the Tetra together.
Let's make several trips, two or three of us in varying combinations.
Or we'll run out of fuel and be trapped in space forever and ever.
We have no choice. Our path is clear.
Excellent! Let's you and I go first!
